text: well we've seen the first pictures now
from the scene and what appears to have
happened is that the goods train started
to derail some 16 of the wagons on the
goods train seem to have come off the
rails and at that point this train from
Moscow to chisinau the capital of
Moldova a long-distance train was
passing and these derailed good wagons
have ripped off the side of two of the
passenger trains carriages the casualty
figures are unconfirmed at the moment
but the reports of three or four dead
and 15 injured the passenger train seems
to have stayed on the line the problem
is that the goods train has torn through
the side of the train this all happened
near a town called narrow from Minsk
which is to the southwest of Moscow as
you say about 50 60 kilometers to the
south west of Moscow and emergency
vehicles obviously on their way to the
scene and the first of the Russian
emergency services teams have arrived
there
